articles.content: A few days after crisis-hit Go First was grounded, the Centre asked airlines to keep fares at affordable levels after it found that airfares on certain routes were spiking rapidly. Go First, which wa… [+1819 chars]

articles.title: ITC's dream run on D-Street to continue - Economic Times
articles.description: ITC shares fell as much as 2% in early trade before recovering all its losses to end marginally in the green. The stock closed at ₹420.10 apiece on the NSE, up 0.10% from the previous close.
